ygData.subject: Monks and Money (was  Twinking thoughts, continued)
ygData.msgSnippet: Brian mentioned:- I think the thing that bothers me the most about EQ is the money situation. The greed factor has almost turned it into a UO-type situation.
ygData.messageBody:
Brian mentioned:-

I think the thing that bothers me the most about EQ is the money situation.
The greed factor has almost turned it into a UO-type situation. I realize
this is a total tangent, but how many of you have actually had to turn OFF
the auction channel on a non-bazaar day? I hate it. I hate greed. I'm
level 20 and I have 15 pp to my name. But that's just me and I could be
stupid :)


I play on The Tribunal, and I don't think we have this problem, there just
aren't that many items for sale. I am level 15 and have over 180plat in the
bank.

I would have more, but when I went (solo-)wisp hunting, I would give LS
away, and sell GLS for 4pp which was around 2pp less than anyone else does.
I recently sold my spare woven (tunic, cape, leggings, bracer) to a fellow
monk who was wearing full leather and had a weight of 34 for 7pp (which is
what I had paid for some of it earlier in my career). Money just isn't a
requirement for me.

I am looking for something to spend money on and cannot find anything -- I
would like some of the top-end jewellery, but I have not seen any jewellers
of high enough skill offering anything.

Can anyone suggest what I should be aiming for? I am wearing mostly woven
(except for shoulders, feet (obviously), waist and head). I am still wearing
2 Cutthroat Rings - I tried the +2Agi rings, but the Derv rings seemed to
work better for me - the 2AC and 4Dex appear to be better than 4Agi.

Would love to hear suggestions from anyone!

Martin

Nyrkl, Monk of the 15th circle, The Tribunal
